name: Shadow of the Tomb Raider - Sworn Defender
detailed_description:
Ancient designs within the Midnight Sentinel outfit allow you to perceive your foes, increasing longer focus time and duration of perception. Armed with the Silver Strike bow, you'll be able to fire heavenly arrows that pierce both enemy body armor and multiple unarmored enemies.

Only available in Croft Edition and Season Pass.

short_description: Equip the Midnight Sentinel outfit to gain increased focus time and perception. Paired with the Silver Strike bow, you'll be able to track down your enemies firing heavenly arrows that pierce through multiple enemies.
